message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it offers exceptional value, even at that price.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending within a budget of $10,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10,000?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $14,000 is already a very competitive price for this product. I could meet you halfway at $12,000, which is the lowest I'm willing to go.
